overview:
David McClellan is Manager,SEO Partnerships with CBS Interactive.

David McClellan was previously Co-founder of Drivin Media, a boutique online marketing agency. During his time with Drivin Media, David worked with many well known companies and was responsible for execution and development of web strategy.

Before Drivin Media, David started a grassroots marketing company which gave him a start in online marketing.

During his previous roles centered around sales and marketing, David he has been honored with a “Master Sales Society” title by Toyota Motor Corp., increased year over year numbers premiums for an insurance brokerage by 300% at the same time increasing client savings of workers compensation by 20%. While at the same company, he was awarded “Top 20” (David was number 9 on the list) agents for premium for the month of May 2008 for Conseco Insurance Company out of 1200+ agents in the U.S.
